summary: In this conversation, the customer was looking to purchase Contoso Wireless internet service and asked questions about the connection speed, security, customer support services, and discounts available for new customers. The agent provided information about the reliable high-speed connection with no data caps or hidden fees, the encryption technology used to protect data, customer support services available 24/7, a satisfaction guarantee with a 30-day money back guarantee on products, and the speed packages available. The customer was satisfied with the answers and looking forward to signing up for Contoso Wireless internet service.
